title: 2020 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD's Board of Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso as President to succeed Sir Suma Chakrabarti in October 2020.

title: Directors of the EBRD
snippet: Mr Patrone previously held the post of Managing Director, Eastern Europe and Caucasus. In that role, he was responsible for the Bankâ€™s operations and policy engagement initiatives in Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia and Moldova and for spearheading the Bank's crisis response to the war on Ukraine. His 30-year career includes senior management and leadership positions in merchant banking, private equity, management consulting and engineering. He joined the EBRD in 2008 as a senior banker with the Corporate Equity team.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: ... We draw on three decades of regional knowledge and financial expertise to tailor our products and approaches to each client's needs. ... Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank.

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors.

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.
